short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask the loafing cat where you are and he'll meow the page title at you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs can get narrow and their titles become unreadable. Sometimes the top of the browser is cluttered with open tabs and the title is obscured by clouds or whatever. If you ever wonder where you are while browsing and need to confirm the name of the active web page in your browser, just click on the extension icon and a cat in a loafing posture will tell you the tab title.
